Basic: Basic Greetings: Bonjour, Au revoir, Merci
Basic Body Parts: Tête, Main, Pied
Yes and No: Oui and Non
Please and Thank You: S'il vous plaît, Merci
Beginner: Introduction to French and Basic Greetings
Common Nouns and Articles (le, la, les, un, une)
Essential Vocabulary: Family, Colors, and Days of the Week
Intermediate: Irregular Verbs in Present Tense (être, avoir, faire, aller)
Past Tenses: Passé Composé and Imparfait
Subjunctive Mood: Introduction and Basic Uses
Advanced: Advanced Subjunctive: Complex Uses and Expressions
Advanced Grammar: Prepositions and Complex Structures
Advanced Conversation: Nuances and Regional Variations
